definition: to work out a strategy/to come up with a plan for
chip (in gambling)/token (for counting)/ticket/to prepare/to plan/to raise (funds)/resource/means

sentences.english: Try to look at as many as you can before you formulate your plan of attack.
sentences.chinese: 在筹谋出击计划之前，尽量多看看。

definition: lit. deep plans and distant thoughts/to plan far ahead (idiom)
to consider/to turn over in one's mind
large scale program of lasting importance/project of paramount importance/to think big/annual national audit
to exhaust one's thoughts and ingenuity (idiom); to think sth through thoroughly/to rack one's brains/to leave no stone unturned
to reckon/to calculate/to plan/to expect/to scheme
to be sentimentally attached to sb or sth
to conceal one's strengths and bide one's time (idiom)/to hide one's light under a bushel
to advance gradually and entrench oneself at every step/to consolidate at every step
lit. before it rains, bind around with silk (idiom, from Book of Songs 詩經|诗经); fig. to plan ahead/to prepare for a rainy day
to make painstaking efforts (idiom); after much trouble/to work hard at sth
